name: Pitfall (Ludum Dare 32)
description:
Pitfall is a 2D isometric puzzle game based around utilizing traps to defeat enemies.
To activate a trap, simply walk over switch that controls it, but be careful not to get caught in the trap!
The goal of each level is to get the key, which is given to a random enemy.

The player can also utilize a ghosting ability, simply activate it and you'll be able to phase through enemies and walk faster for a short period of time.

Controls:
W,A,S,D: Movement
E: Ghost
ESCAPE: Pause
